question: Write at least 150 words. You have seen a job advertised in the newspaper. You want toapply for the job.Write a letter to the manager of the company.In your letter• provide information about yourself• give details of your previous work experience• Say why the company should consider you for the job You do NOT need to write anyaddresses. Begin your letter as follows:Dear Sir,
text: I am writing this letter in reference to inquire about the loss of documents that I believe have forgotten in your hotel while attending a meeting recently.  The moment I reached home I realized my papers are missing.

I clearly remember picking up the certificates from the reception desk while I was directed towards the restaurant. In the restaurant I was seated in the non-smoking area next to the buffet counter. It was a table for four.
These records are important for my immigration to the USA. It contains my educational transcripts and my visa details. Without these ,documents I would not be able to continue my procedure further.

Requesting you to check with the security department, if they have received any documents. In case they have them, hand them over to the receptionist. You can reply to my email mentioning that documents have been given to the concierge. Please, do not forget to add high important option in the email so that I do not miss it.

error_list.error_des: It appears that you are missing a comma after the introductory phrase In the restaurant. Consider adding a comma.
